title: Kylie Jenner dons a diamond necklace and is joined by new bestie Stassie for Drake's birthday party
text:
They've become the best of friends since a scandal shocked the Kardashian world earlier this year.

And Kylie Jenner made sure to bring her new best friend Stassie Karanikolaou to Drake's 33rd birthday party at Goya Studios in West Hollywood on Wednesday night.

The 22-year-old billionaire wore a massive diamond necklace to the sparkling soiree while Stassie dressed to impress in a black gown.

Bling, bling: Kylie Jenner wore a massive diamond necklace to Drake's 33rd birthday party at Goya Studios in West Hollywood on Wednesday night

Kylie looked sensational in a fashionable black number with capped sleeves to showcase her incredible baubles.

In addition to the impressive necklace, she added a pair of matching earrings with a massive emerald stone.

The youngest of the Kardashian/Jenner brood slicked back her dark brown hair into a chic bun and wore a nude lip to highlight her flawless complexion.

Friends in high places: The 22-year-old billionaire brought her new best friend Stassie Karanikolaou to the sparkling soiree

Sparkle and shine: In addition to the impressive necklace, she added a pair of matching earrings with a massive emerald stone

Stassie headed out of the festivities carrying an empty wine glass and wearing a one-shouldered black dress.

She matched her makeup mogul bestie and wore her platinum blonde tresses tied up in a bun.

Earlier in the week, the girls joined forces for hers-and-hers Lasik surgery and shared their adventures on YouTube.

Party favors? Stassie headed out of the festivities carrying an empty wine glass and wearing a one-shouldered black dress

Seeing things: Earlier in the week, the girls joined forces for hers-and-hers Lasik surgery and shared their adventures on YouTube

Kylie had a little more room in her life to add a new sidekick after a challenging start to the year when her best friend Jordyn Woods revealed she kissed Khloe Kardashian's love-rat boyfriend Tristan Thompson at a house party in Los Angeles on Valentine's Day weekend.

While Tristan had previously been caught up in multiple cheating scandals — DailyMail.com broke the news of his affairs just days before she gave birth to their daughter True — this infidelity was the last straw for Khloe and she ended things with the professional basketball player for good.

Khloe recently admitted in a Keeping Up With The Kardashians trailer that she misses her ex-husband, former NBA player Lamar Odom, 'all the time.'
description: The 22-year-old billionaire wore a massive diamond necklace to the sparkling soiree while Stassie dressed to impress in a black gown.
